title: Unmasked
overview: Unmasked follows murder cases committed by killers hiding behind hideous masks. Part horror movie part true-crime mystery, Unmasked is filled with bone-chilling scares, emotional reveals from victim's families and investigative twists and turns that make for a compelling mix of suspense and terror. From a demented clown, to a Big Bad Wolf, tune in to find out who is behind the mask.
